title: 109_hr5291
content: Gang Elimination Act of 2006 - Directs the Attorney General to report to Congress on a national strategy to eliminate the illegal operations of National Threat Drug Gangs . Sets forth criteria for the Attorney General to consider in identifying a National Threat Drug Gang, including (1) ties to international terrorist organizations or state-sponsored terrorism. (2) the volume of controlled substances imported or distributed by such gangs. And (3) the threat to children and schools in the United States.
